location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence among various British officials communicating the movements and possible intentions of Major Frank Holmes regarding various oil-industry related events. One telegram at the end of the file refers to the date of Major Holmes' death.
